processAffy

processAffy.Rd

Processing pipeline for raw affymetrics array data. Utilizes affy package

Usage

processAffy(cel_dir)

Arguments

cel_dir

String. Directory containing CEL files to process

Value

List of matrices. Two expression matrices from processed affy object, one of raw data, one of normalized data

Examples

# \donttest{
# Download an Affymetrix dataset
geo_accession <- "GSE6629"
temp_dir <- getwd()
gse_dir <- sprintf("%s/%s", temp_dir, geo_accession)
getSuppFiles(GEO = geo_accession,
             makeDirectory = TRUE,
             baseDir = temp_dir,
             fetch_files = TRUE,
             filter_regex = NULL,
             download_method = "curl",
             unpack = TRUE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0
#> 

# Process dataset
affy_output_list <- processAffy(gse_dir)
#> Warning: replacing previous import ‘AnnotationDbi::tail’ by ‘utils::tail’ when loading ‘hgu133plus2cdf’
#> Warning: replacing previous import ‘AnnotationDbi::head’ by ‘utils::head’ when loading ‘hgu133plus2cdf’
#> 
#> Background correcting
#> Normalizing
#> Calculating Expression

# Test output
names(affy_output_list) # c("raw_expression", "normalized_expression")
#> [1] "raw_expression"        "normalized_expression"
dim(affy_output_list$raw_expression) # c(1354896, 2)
#> [1] 1354896       2
dim(affy_output_list$normalized_expression) # c(54675, 2)
#> [1] 54675     2
# }
